title: Hremhmuna ka awm lo hi
lyrics:
Hremhmuna ka awm lo hi,
Mak ka ti hle;
Sual vanga kih tur ka nih,
Ka hre reng e.

Nung tura dama ka la awm hian,
Thupha chawiin,
Pathian rawng hi ka bawl ang,
Min zuah vangin.

Dam leh hrisel hi a hlu,
Lawm a tul e;
Tawng aiin tiha lawm chu
A tha zawk hle.

Chatuan hmawr ko kan dak thin,
Hnuk chhat phut se,
Beiin khawsa ilangin,
Kan inpeih ang.
